name: Police Chase: Drag Racing
description:
Welcome to the right side of the law. In this adrenaline-pumping, ultra-fast racer you’ll act as a law enforcement officer. Engage in high-speed chases, break the speed records and catch the criminals!

There are several unique, high-performance cars you can drive in the game. You’ll start with a regular police vehicle. As you progress in your career you’ll get access to the fearless off-roader, ultra-quick lambo and many many more.

Your choice of vehicle is crucial as you’ll be racing through different environments: forest, city, winter and desert. All maps are designed to make chasing the villains varied and exciting!

Collect sheriff stars, avoid any obstacles and help the law shine again!

GAME FEATURES

INTELLIGENT OPPONENTS
The criminals you have to catch are not some mindless drones. You will have to show skill and smarts if you want to succeed!

DIFFERENT MODES OF STEERING
Choose the control method that suits your style best and start pulling amazing feats of driving!

AWESOME 3D GRAPHICS
The enviroment and cars come to life thanks to the state-of-the art graphics and special effects!

ONLINE LEADERBOARDS
Compare your score against other around the world. Show your prowess and race to the top!
